oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Provost Marshal passes and orders
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One order, sent from "Headquarters Left Wing Army [of] Ten[nessee]" orders that "Quartermaster's or foraging parties belonging to this command will not forage any more from this man J. Hunley, as he has no more than will support his family until Spring." Written by elements of Gen. Longstreet's command.
